languages.english-overview:
Oxwall is unbelievably flexible and easy to use PHP/MySQL community software platform.
Oxwall is used for a wide range of projects starting from family sites and custom social networks to collaboration tools and enterprise community solutions.
Oxwall is released under the Common Public Attribution License 1.0.

ul.li: Realtime activity notifications, newsfeed, instant chat
Comment, tag, rate any kind of content

languages.english-err_php526: The PHP version is less than the required 5.2.6 version!
